definitions.definition: Placed in a grave at a burial.
To ritualistically inter in a grave or tomb.

definitions.example: bury a bone;  bury the embers

definitions.definition: To hide or conceal as if by covering with earth or another substance.
definitions.example: she buried her face in the pillow;  they buried us in paperwork

definitions.definition: To suppress and hide away in one's mind.
definitions.example: secrets kept buried; she buried her shame and put on a smiling face.

definitions.definition: To put an end to; to abandon.
definitions.example: They buried their argument and shook hands.

definitions.definition: To render imperceptible by other, more prominent stimuli; drown out.
